casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Andrew Maurice RANDOLPH, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 159306
COA: 321551 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 22, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to file an application for leave to appeal in excess of the page limitation is GRANTED. The 66-page application submitted on March 19, 2019, is accepted for filing.
